body.description: Looking for a men's bar soap that will thoroughly clean your skin and leave it feeling hydrated, cool, and comfortable? Treat your skin every day with the mild but effective formula of Dove Men+Care Clean Comfort Body and Face Bar. More than just a regular men’s bar soap, this bar from the #1 Dermatologist Recommended Men’s Brand has a formula that cleanses your skin and delivers refreshment and skin comfort. This body bar is part of the Dove Clean Comfort range and unlike regular bar soap for men which can dry your skin out, the Dove Men+Care bar contains ¼ moisturizing cream that helps maintain skin’s hydration and moisture levels, while also delivering a refreshing clean. Dove Men+Care understands the importance of having a simple daily routine for caring for your skin. This Dove Clean Comfort Body and Face Bar is noncomedogenic and can be used across your whole body to gently clean skin and is even mild enough for use on your face. In the shower, simply wet the Dove Men+Care bar and rub it between your hands to produce a light foam lather before working it over your skin and rinsing thoroughly. The creamy foam rinses away easily and the non-greasy foaming lather will provide a comfortable, refreshing clean.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on July 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Last, smell good, clean, and moisturize
reviews.reviewText: Clean comfortThe blue one is my number one favorite because when you do use it it lathers real quick. It lathers a lot. The smell is not like a perfume but like some type a powder. Like a baby powder. This soap does the work to keep you clean and also keeps your body so soft. This soap also can last. This soap is not easy to find it seems and it seems to be more expensive. That lets me know that people prefer this one more.I recommend using it with cold showers.🥶Skin defenseThe orange soap is my second favorite.It also lathers but not much as the blue one. It has a tiny bit smell of perfume. I describe it like a lotion with just a tad of perfume. It is not a bad smell. It keeps your body smooth too. It does not last as the blue one but last more than the green one. This soap was easy to find.Extra freshThe green one has a strong perfume. Smells stronger than the others. It's a really good smell also. I found this soap not last at all. It was easy to find.So, I was looking for a soap that would last, smell good, clean, and moisturize your skin. The blue one does all of that for me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Can't find this in any store near me. I'm glad they have some online. I love the smell of it and easy to rinse off.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Been using this soap for years now.With dry skin I needed a soap with cream.I’m old fashioned to prefer a bar over shower gel.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fight the war on plastic!
reviews.reviewText: I use a lot of Dove Men products, including their body washes. My wife came to me a few months ago because she is very concerned about plastics and our apparent inability to actually recycle them even though the symbol is there. We're phasing out as much plastic in our household goods as possible, so my body wash had to go!I originally switched to body wash because typical bar soap never felt like it did the job, and the scruntchy thingy always left my skin feeling nice. I expected to do some research and find that some over-priced appothecary company with a bearded dude as a logo was going to be all the rage. I was actually surprised to find that Dove Men reviewed quite well so I gave it a try.After a few weeks, I can report that I am happy with the experience. The soap works well both as a body and face wash, and my skin feels clean and not itchy. My wife's starting to balk a bit on getting rid of some of her favorite products, but I'm at least happy at this one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love the smell
reviews.reviewText: Love the smell and it’s soft and smooth. Women can use it too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 17, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on July 25, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The soap functions well on all levels.
reviews.reviewText: The soap cleanses very well with immediate and plentiful suds . The smell is manly and it easily rinses clean. It's a pleasure to use on a daily basis.I also use it as shaving cream. It's thick and rich.
